title: Manchester City v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: The first Manchester derby of the season is set to take place, with anticipation surrounding which team will emerge victorious. Rob Smyth provides insights and analysis leading up to the match. Fans are eager to see the outcome of this fierce rivalry.

title: Burnley v Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: Liverpool aims to extend their winning streak as they face Burnley at Turf Moor. A live minute-by-minute report by John Brewin will provide updates on the match. Fans can follow the action to see if Liverpool can maintain their momentum.

title: England v Scotland: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 quarter-final – live
summary: Niall McVeigh is providing a live report on the match between the hosts and Scotland, as they compete for a spot in the semi-finals. The updates will focus on the key moments and developments throughout the game. Fans can stay informed on the unfolding action and the stakes involved.

title: France 18-13 Ireland: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 quarter-final – live
summary: Daniel Gallan is providing live updates from the third quarter-final match at Exeter's Sandy Park. Fans can follow his minute-by-minute report for the latest developments. Stay tuned for key moments and highlights from the game.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Jefferson-Wooden and Seville blast to 100m golds – live
summary: Daniel Harris reports live from Tokyo, covering a bustling evening filled with medal events. Athletes are competing for top honors in various competitions. Tune in for the latest updates and highlights.
